ratings.notes: proposed_contextual_controlled<TAB>4<TAB>5<TAB>3<TAB>4<TAB>The response shows context relevance and persona consistency but lacks a bit of naturalness in tone, which is understandable given the strict nature of the character.

baseline_no_context<TAB>2<TAB>4<TAB>4<TAB>3<TAB>This arm follows protocol well with consistent persona and decent quality but lacks context relevance as it doesn't address immediate concerns or recent events directly affecting the player.
